entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 March 2023
